summary: This document is a forwarded email from November 29, 2018, containing a link to a Miami Herald article titled 'Alexander Acosta gave Jeffrey Epstein the deal of a lifetime'. It highlights media coverage of the controversial plea deal negotiated for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Alexander Acosta
persons.context: Named in the forwarded email subject and article title as the official who gave Jeffrey Epstein a favorable plea deal.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Miami Herald article regarding the plea deal negotiated by Alexander Acosta.

connections.description: Acosta, as U.S. Attorney, negotiated the controversial non-prosecution agreement for Epstein.

events.title: Email Forwarding Miami Herald Article
events.description: An email is forwarded containing a link to a Miami Herald article critical of Alexander Acosta's role in Jeffrey Epstein's plea deal.

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated November 29, 2018, referencing a Miami Herald article.
The article's title is 'Alexander Acosta gave Jeffrey Epstein the deal of a lifetime', indicating critical media coverage of the plea deal.
Alexander Acosta is identified as the U.S. Attorney who negotiated the controversial agreement for Jeffrey Epstein.
The email's origin shows internal communication or sharing of significant media reporting on the case.
